entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
